document.full_text: jim furyk signaled his intent to retain the heritage title in the best way possible by charging into a tie for the early lead in friday's second round at harbour town golf links.
document.title: jim furyk moves into early share of heritage lead
lines_and_colors: jim furyk signaled his intent to retain the heritage title in the best way possible by charging into a tie for the early lead in friday's second round at harbour town golf links.
